doc.title: That's Boating
doc.plot: An exciting look at the lifestyle, destinations and practical information that surround recreational boating. Whether it's exploring the Great Lakes by powerboat, sailing over the emerald waters of the British Virgin Islands by charter, or crewing on some of the great wood-hulled ships of days long past, THAT'S BOATING covers it all. The program profiles a broad range of boating styles, from kayaks and canoes to sailboats and powerboats. Discover the pleasures of the boating lifestyle as THAT'S BOATING tours areas as diverse as the Caribbean and the Inter-Coastal Waterway down through the Eastern United States. In addition, every episode features a boat review with a complete assessment of features and performance.
